name: Escape the Lab (itch) (Champlain Game Academy 2021)
description:
You are trying to escape an underground bunker and the organization is trying to “pacify” you. In order to succeed, you must avoid the hunter’s bullets. Maneuver around the intricate base with your high jumps and evasive dashes. Crash into enemies while making your way out of the base to take them out and stop them from capturing you again.

  • Use WASD to Move
  • Left Shift to Dash
  • Move the mouse for camera control
  •  Dash into enemies to eliminate them, but watch out for their bullets

CREDITS:

Rico Bechdel: Character Designer

Felix Aguayo: 3D Modeler

Zachary Elkin: UI Designer

Zhengli Sieh: Game Programmer
